headline: Norfolk Southern’s East Edge Corridor Puts Intermodal Growth And Valuation In Focus
summary: Norfolk Southern (NYSE:NSC) has opened its new East Edge double-stack corridor linking Chicago to New England. The corridor is designed to increase intermodal capacity and address freight bottlenecks in the Northeast. This project is described by the company as its largest operational enhancement in decades. Norfolk Southern, trading at $291.24, is putting fresh attention on its core rail network with the launch of East Edge. The company is already an established player in Eastern U.S...
